function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Home isolation and pop-up quarantine facilities for COVID-19 patients","Impact":"Increased risk of contamination in these locations","Mitigation":"Strict waste management protocols and hygiene practices","Technologies":"Disinfection technology for reusable personal protective equipment","People":"Patients in home isolation, quarantine facilities, waste collectors","Owner":"Local authorities, waste management sector"},{"Description":"Dispersed nature of cases and infected individuals","Impact":"Challenge in waste management due to widespread outbreak","Mitigation":"Best management practices for waste handling and hygiene, separate collection services for infected households","Technologies":"Waste collection technologies, disinfection equipment","People":"Infected individuals, waste collectors, local authorities","Owner":"Waste management sector, local authorities"},{"Description":"Potential role of the environment in the spread of SARS-CoV-2","Impact":"Increased risk of contamination through waste collection","Mitigation":"Strict waste management protocols, disinfection of reusable personal protective equipment","Technologies":"Disinfection technology for reusable personal protective equipment","People":"Waste collectors, local authorities, general public","Owner":"Waste management sector, local authorities"}]}
